name: conversations.setTopic
desc: Sets the topic for a conversation.

channel.desc: Conversation to set the topic of.

topic.desc: The new topic string. Does not support formatting or linkification.

{
    "ok": true,
    "channel": {
        "id": "C12345678",
        "name": "tips-and-tricks",
        "is_channel": true,
        "is_group": false,

        "is_shared": false,

        "pending_shared": [],

        ],
